website_summaries.verdict: Warm material and appealing patterns make this quilt set worth considering, especially for winter use.
pros: Constructed of 100% cotton that's soft, warm, and suitable for use in cold temperatures
Comes in a choice of bold, colorful patterns that pair nicely with different bedroom décor
cons: While it's machine-washable, colors tend to fade, so washing it in cold water is a must
Some pilling and loose stitching reported

customer_reviews.title: Who the hell went and took a single poke with a highlighter on my sack
customer_reviews.text: Ok so this quilt is fine, not to hot, not to cold, I fell like freaking gold I locks in this b*tc#, only deal I have with this thing is the single freaking pink dot on my cover. WTH guy, on a black and grey quilt.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Black and gray buffalo check
customer_reviews.text: It’s black and gray buffalo check. There is definitely black in there. Just wanted you to know. :) Nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: austinmama

customer_reviews.title: Great Quilt
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quilt. Felt like an old one my grandma made. I wish they made a red and white one as well. I’m currently looking for one for the 4th of July.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: This looks great with pops of red with accent pillows in my sons room. He sleeps hot all of the time and this Quilt is the right weight. His favorite colors are red and black and this looks really great in his room
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Fits nice
customer_reviews.text: The grey is darker than shown in pics. Has good weight and washes nicely
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Cotton!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not too heavy. Love the fact it is cotton. The color is very nice, more muted than a traditional black/white buffalo check.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am pretty happy. I wish it was a little softer.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Color should say black and gray
customer_reviews.text: It's more black than gray. It wasn't the color that I expected but the size and softness is great.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy G Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: It. came out of the box feeling and looking great. Ample coverage for the queen bed
customer_reviews.author: S. Funk

customer_reviews.title: Great look and quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Woolrich bed set. I love the quality and durability you get from them. Im super happy with it over all. I have the Full/Queen on my full bed and it covers perfectly, touching the floor on three sides.. My bed does sit a bit lower than a standard box spring mattress set though. I have the Zinus platform bed with Zinus 12" foam mattress. Also, I would say it's a true grey consisting of white and black, no warm or cool tones.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Morrison

customer_reviews.title: no problem with the comforter it was the gray color
customer_reviews.text: The set was fine. I wasn't 100% sure about the gray checkered plaid versus just a black & white one but I thought I'd try it. While it was a nice comforter set, it just didn't give me the pop of color that I wanted. That is the only reason that I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue S.

customer_reviews.title: Black and grey
customer_reviews.text: These are nice bed linens, soft and warm. I didn't however realize that the buffalo plaid pattern is not white and black its grey and black.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Great quality. Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: momma_lamb

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: It’s not evident in the picture, but this quilt has a lot of black in it. I sent this back.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Alsobrooks

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate to order this if you like how it looks!
customer_reviews.text: We were ordering a new bedroom set and I needed a new Quilt since we were going from a Queen to a King. I loved the look of this one but after reading some of the reviews was hesitant to order it. After many hours looking online I just decided to go for it and am so glad I did. The colors are just like the picture and not too dark. It is also soft to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: Pdcteach

customer_reviews.title: Just What We Were Looking For!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I spent several hours and many miles looking for a new bed coverings. Color, texture, pattern, and style mattered more than price. We couldn't find anything either of us liked. She wouldn't hear of ordering online until she became frustrated from lack of choice. I showed her the picture of this set. The price was right. The color and pattern was perfect, but she couldn't "feel it." I agreed to send it back if she didn't like it when it arrived. It arrived quickly and was perfect. It looks very nice with th bedroom decor. She's happy so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: William T. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Very warm and comfortable Quilt.
customer_reviews.text: We love this quilt! We prefer quilts for our bedding and were looking for a slightly heavier quilt for the fall/winter months in a rustic design and this quilt works great. Its very warm and comfortable. I like Woolrich products, and this is well-made. The picture is pretty much true to the actual product.
customer_reviews.author: Review4U

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for NE Ohio weather
customer_reviews.text: Quality is exceptional. Wish I would've ordered one of these years ago. Amazon is $12 cheaper then any other online company that sells it. Perfect for NE Ohio weather. Will be using all year round. Love that its 100 percent cotton, washes and dries nicely leaving it extremely soft.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINE NICOLE

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I will admit I’m disappointed in the quality of the quilt. After 4 washings, on delicate cycle, I have noticed lines beginning on the fabric that look as if they could rip open soon. So, I’m afraid to wash it. Also the colors have faded!! On a positive note it’s very warm and cozy, just wish it were made better!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Meyer

customer_reviews.title: It's All Good!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this is "all good"! The size, the weight, the colors are great. I noticed in other reviews there were different opinions about whether the main color was gray or brown. Here's my opinion. In natural light the color looks brown. In indoor light, like at night, it looks gray. Either color works for me!
customer_reviews.author: J. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality
customer_reviews.text: This quilt looks much better in the photos on-line than it did when it arrived. The color of the darker fabrics was faded-looking and just not the vibrant, clean look you see in the photos. I wish I would have returned it right away because after just one wash on a cold, delicate cycle, it looks even worse. The lighter patches of fabric look fine, ut the darker patches are definitely disappointing and take away from the overall look. I typically buy Eddie Bauer quilts, but really liked the colors and pattern of this one so tried Woolrich.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: So glad I found this!
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you how much I love this bed set! It was just what I have been wanting color scheme & pattern wise. Compared to $200 sets, you can't beat this! It is not super heavy, but it is heavier than my last comforter. I actually think it helps me to sleep better without tossing and turning so much! It's a tad oversized compared to typical queen comforters which is a huge plus in my book. Plenty of quilt on each side of the bed without hanging in the floor. If you are considering this, just go ahead and do it!
customer_reviews.author: 3296kg

customer_reviews.title: Love this farmhouse quilt!
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for a farmhouse checkered quilt for a while now. I didn't want the black and white check but wanted a more subdued check pattern. Then I found this quilt! It is b e a u t i f u l!!!! It's a black and tan (off white) check pattern. It's just the right heaviness and keeps us warm on snowy nights. If you're looking for a quilt to enhance a farmhouse bedroom - look no further than this Woolrich Buffalo Check Plaid! Great value for the money too. Well made and just the best addition for a farmhouse look. I could go on and on with how much I love this quilt!
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: This quilt has a Dye Problem -- Beware!
customer_reviews.text: Apparently the red dye used to color this red and black quilt is not stable enough to be washed, despite both the Amazon product description and the information on the tag saying that it is machine washable. It turned the inside of my dryer pink. It is now proving extremely difficult to remove the pink dye from the inside of the dryer!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Whitlock

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: It had a pretty strong smell coming out of the package but washed well the first time and didn’t shrink. Looks very thin but I’m fact it almost feels like a weighted blanket and is VERY warm! Shrunk up a little the second wash but still held up and still fits. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Smith

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE COLORS YOU SEE HERE.  Ew.
customer_reviews.text: If you want this to look like this pic, don’t buy it. I researched 6 ways from Sunday and this color profile IS “the light one” but it looks NOTHING like the pic in person re colors. It has a greenish-brown tonality overall. The cream color is non-existent. Didn’t go with any of my decor and just looked gross. Had it matched the pic, it would have been perfect. Quality was great though, I will say that. But it got sent back :(
customer_reviews.author: Itsallinthename

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This quilt is nicely oversized and is mid weight. Not too light and not too heavy. The colors are a little different than pictured...especially the tan. I find it to be a bit darker than in the pic. It should be noted that it had quite a musty odor right out of the box. I don’t normally put anything on the beds without washing it first but I had to use an odor eliminating detergent on this in order to get the smell out. It did come out after one wash and an extra rinse. Since the smell did come out I am very satisfied with this quilt. It will make a nice neutral on my guest bed.
customer_reviews.author: S. Peters

customer_reviews.title: POOR FABRIC QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: was great for the first few days, and then the fabric started showing it was pulling apart/tearing. I guess I spent 80.00 to use a quilt for three days and then have to buy a new one. POOR QUALITY.
customer_reviews.author: courtney

customer_reviews.title: Nice but has more "cooler" brown tones than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is really a lovely quilt, and I would have kept it except the darker brown colour was wrong for my bedroom. I thought it was a chocolate brown (which has more yellow in it) but the brown is actually a dark taupe (which has more of a gray undertone). In fact, the majority of the brown colours in the quilt have a grey undertone. They all work well together. The stitching is done well, and the fabric weight is nice enough. I had just wanted warmer brown tones.
customer_reviews.author: Professorowl

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and look
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a mostly cotton quilt set and this is pretty close. 5% of the fill isn't cotton and the backing of the shams isn't. This quilt has a great weight and drapes nicely. The stitching is pretty good to keep the fill in place. It should last well. It does shed a bit of fill in the wash but that's normal; nothing excessive. White dog hairs show up from the border-collie but they don't stand out as much as a solid blanket would. I recommend this quilt set to all considering it.
customer_reviews.author: SciFi Junkette

customer_reviews.title: Lint on it like crazy
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of it and it's great of winter/fall. However it is full of link which is very hard to remove. It's gray/white link and even after washing the blanket it's so full of this link I have to use one of those silicon mitts to try and remove as much as I can before drying; even then it's full of this lint.
customer_reviews.author: Jh

customer_reviews.title: It is a little larger then most King size comforters I LlOVE LOVE it, My master bedroom in our little cabin ...
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with this comforter, the weight and size are exactly as I wanted, It is a little larger then most King size comforters I LlOVE LOVE it, My master bedroom in our little cabin is so cute, I added two deer pillows, so cute
customer_reviews.author: Christine R

customer_reviews.title: Bright beautiful quilt!
customer_reviews.text: Very bright beautiful colors and very christmas-sy. The colors of the quilt are bungandy, black, beige/cream. I got the deer pillow cover separately to go with it. It feels wonderful to enter my room every day now. I use the quilt more like a coverlet but it definitely is a nice medium weight quilt.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Don't think it'll last long
customer_reviews.text: Really like the look, but parts are much more tan than in the pictures where they appeared closer to white. Washed it once on gentle and there are already a bunch of loose threads. I even dried it on a drying rack instead of putting it in a dryer. Lint clings to it big time too. For the price, the quality is really low. Disappointed I took a chance after reading other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I did my research on this product and thought there were more positive reviews then negative. Well. I should have listened to the negative reviews. It looks great out of the bag, but DO NOT WASH IT. This has to be the worst quilt I have ever bought. It came out of the washer and will never look the same. The black and red has faded. It is going to take me hours to to pick the fuzz balls off and use a cloths roller. DO NOT BUY. If I was not in quarantine and could get ahold of someone at Amazon this would go back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality quilt.
customer_reviews.text: This quilt is the best one I have found. I got other ones at the department store and this was the best I found. I took the other ones back and got a refund. I even both the quilt throw to match it. It was also by woolrich. It was better than what I could have ever expected.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jennings

customer_reviews.title: What's up with the pilling?!?
customer_reviews.text: I love the look, the feel and the overall quality but the only thing that really is disappointing is after the very first out-of-package wash it already shows pilling on the top fabrics. I followed the washing instructions (cool wash by itself, low dry in a brand new front loader washer/dryer) The one thing I hate most is pilling on bedding. Really hope it doesn't get worse!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Zarbeck

customer_reviews.title: Not as discribed!
customer_reviews.text: This description states gray plaid-there is NO gray in it! It is all shades of brown!! Not pleased at all!
customer_reviews.author: Donna D

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful rustic quilt set
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this Woolrich quilt. So bright and beautiful and the perfect rustic charm for our log home. The queen size hangs over the sides just the perfect amount. The colors are exactly as pictured: bright red, black, tan and cream. Highly recommend. Shipping arrived almost a week ahead of what was promised, so that was great, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, vibrant, and well made.
customer_reviews.text: This set is gorgeous. I was astounded by how bright the quilt actually is because sometimes I order things and the color is just off. But not with this item. This is a well-made set with beautiful vibrant colors. I am very pleased with this purchase. If you are on the fence on this one- take the plunge. It’s absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Love love!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Thought it would be more cream colored but it is more tan brown. Either way it’s a beautiful quilt. Covers my king bed all over and looks so nice. I can mix and match so many pillows when I want to change my color mood.
customer_reviews.author: Dene Black

customer_reviews.title: I am going to keep it as it will look good in another room I have with a black bedroom ...
customer_reviews.text: This quilt seems very well made. I only give it 4 stars because the colors are not accurate in the description. I was hoping it was navy but it is black and brown. I am going to keep it as it will look good in another room I have with a black bedroom set. This does not go well with an espresso colored bedroom set. Again, great quality but colors are not what they appear in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Wildflower525

customer_reviews.title: The stitching is already torn!
customer_reviews.text: I was really in love with this when I got it. The other night I noticed the corner of one of the "patches" was completely unstitched. Now the one next to it is doing the same thing. It's not experiencing high traffic so I don't understand but it was pretty expensive to be coming apart so fast...
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: NO regrets!  Love this quilt.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured and described. I ordered the brown plaid and I am in love with it. It is a bit heavier than I thought it was going to be, but I am happy with that. The quilt is very well made and the close stitching stands up to my dogs. I have bought several quilts online before and this is the absolute first time I have never regretted the purchase. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Archuleta

customer_reviews.title: Fades after 1 wash
customer_reviews.text: So the first time I washed the blanket it faded. It's a good thick quality other than that. Not for someone like myself that has a dog up on the bed. I wash my blankets every 3 days so this definitely wont hold up to real use. Maybe if this was a guest bed and you just washed the sheets this would work but not for so.eone who washes regular.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice weight for winter into spring
customer_reviews.text: This washes up nice, and looks great on the bed. The colors and so versatile. I did take it off for summer but I think I could have really got away with the weight in the summer, but my husband runs on the warm side. Also by switching it out in the summer it gives me a different look so I don't get bored with the same one. I feels nice, washes nice and wears nice. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: be warned strange smell
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty quilt, much darker than the picture...with lots of dark charchole black/brown. The weight is nice and light. My only issue is really a terrible smell, I'm debating if I should even try to wash it or send it back. It's a very musty, chemical scent. No way would i want to pull it up near my face!!!
customer_reviews.author: T Leibbrandt

customer_reviews.title: Well-made fairly heavy quilt
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the quality of this quilt. It is amply large to cover my king-sized bed. The colors are vibrant (red, black, tan, white). And the quilt is fairly heavy for cotton. I would definitely buy this again. Woolrich is a great brand and didn't disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Like2Read

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and cute quilt set, feels soft but not microfiber soft. Keeps us warm at night and is very nice sized, plenty of overhang on either side of the bed and we have a KING! The color is more grayish than taupe but its still very cute for fall and winter. Also, It does have kind of a strong smell to it when you take it out of the packaging, almost like how your clothes smell after bleaching them, but it doesn't "stink" and I'm sure that it will go away after a couple washes. Great quality and price I definitely recommend Woolrich!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon J Moody

customer_reviews.title: very nice true colored quilt
customer_reviews.text: This is nothing fancy, it is a simple quilt with out bulky batting. Not very comfortable but I was going for the look. Quality is fine with true red and black colors. I will say the smell of the set coming from the package was a little over whelming of chemicals/plastic. Not sure why, must be the unhealthy dyes! It is what I wanted so I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Popowich

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I got the tan/black. Good quality. Just the look I was going for.
customer_reviews.author: Pmncm

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality - well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: THis quilt and sham set is very nice. High quality Woolrich feel and just the right thickness. I have washed it twice and the colors are just as brilliant as when new. It is a perfect weight - not too heavy, not too thin. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this comforter
customer_reviews.text: I love the look, the feel, and the fact that it fits my cal king so well. It is the perfect size. I am going to buy another on so I can have a lighter color scheme for the summer.
customer_reviews.author: J Flores

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Awesome construction and the pattern is perfect as is the size. Haven't used it yet due to temp and it is not a summer covering for MA unless you have air conditioning that I do not have. Very good product for the price and would buy another one tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Don C. Hayward

customer_reviews.title: Not as described.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the holidays and just unboxed it, it did not come with shams as described. I guess I should not have trusted the description. It’s a beautiful quilt but I really need the shams, and I’m past my time to return it.
customer_reviews.author: farmergirl

customer_reviews.title: This quilt is Huge!
customer_reviews.text: I love this quilt! I do not like blankets on the bed that barely hang over the edger. This quilt is almost as long as the bed skirt on all sides. I don’t have to worry about getting uncovered in the middle of the night. The colors and beautiful and it’s so soft.
customer_reviews.author: Laura L.

customer_reviews.title: POOR OVERALL QUALITY-- WOOLRICH
customer_reviews.text: I rated this product poorly because of the quality, it was bought before Xmas and developed these rips/tears within 2 weeks of actually using the Quilt. It was at a discounted price and its still entirely usable and functional, but I did expect more quality from the Woolrich brand.... disappointed but its fixable buy a seamstress I guess.... I most likely would not buy this brand again or recommend to family or friends but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Tim H

customer_reviews.title: Huge and Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I had buffalo plaid sheets and was looking for a comforter or quilt that would match it but not be the exact same. This quilt and sham set was exactly what I had in mind. I got the full/queen size for my full-size bed and it's huge! It keeps me warm and very comfortable. I'd definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Fazio

customer_reviews.title: The best quilt I have ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: This is everything that I have wanted in a quilt. Light weight for me to manage it,and wash it, has kept me very warm. The color is perfect for my Fall/Winter quilt. No one will be disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl  Marble

customer_reviews.title: Truly an oversized cotton quilt
customer_reviews.text: I have had such a hard time finding an oversized cotton quilt. I could find cotton, but not oversized, or I could find poly. This is generously sized and covers our 15" mattress all the way around. It is 100% cotton and a good weight, not too heavy, not too flimsy. It's breathable, unlike poly quilts that make me and my hot natured husband sweat. We have bought two now, under $100 each. I wash them with cold water and dry with low temp to avoid any shrinkage. Another brand quilt shrunk badly and no longer fit after washing and drying on warm temp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You will love it!
customer_reviews.text: Nice bright colors, the block that shows up on the pic as beige or white is actually a small pattern but it looks nice. This is not a thick coverlet but not thin either. Just a nice winter change of pace. I did order a California King size to fit my extra tall Queen sleigh bed. It fits perfectly. The shams are very generous in size. I also ordered two shower curtains for window treatments. The curtain has a white lining.
customer_reviews.author: dewdrop2057

customer_reviews.title: Love the Red
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant because i purchased onine and all but it definitely made ny day once this arrived.Took very few days to receive and for the cash its a good buy, u dont want a POS blanket so spend the $100 its well worth it.You get what u pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Essensa

customer_reviews.title: Quality is very good!
customer_reviews.text: The only draw back is it is about 6-7 inches short on the sides. So we make it Fit on the side of the bed that is shown. Perfect length width is what is short. We love it! Husband likes it ALOT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Matte not Glossy
customer_reviews.text: After unboxing it, I thought it wouldn’t be warm enough because it’s a “Summer” Comforter. Once under it and a set of flannel sheets there wasn’t a doubt it was very comfortable. Note** Don’t let the first image fool you! The pattern is accurate but the colors have been enhanced to be brighter than they actually are... personally I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: a great quilt that is big enough to cover it all
customer_reviews.text: I love this quilt. Very well made and big enough to cover my mattress and the box springs. Also love the feel, soft and just the right weight to sleep comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Rippe

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: to be hones im very dissatisfied with this product to start off its really cheap material when i received it the firts impression i had was seen a lot of threads comming out of the quilt and then it smells a lot like chemical idk but i expect more quality for the price i pay almost $100 totally not recommend it
customer_reviews.author: areli g.

customer_reviews.title: Pattern looks nice
customer_reviews.text: I wanted and ordered the tan one that was pictured, but they sent me a different one, it was a dark brown on the inside instead of light tan like the picture. They do look similar but the pictured one looks more subtle color wise. There’s a smell, similar to wet leaves when opening. I’ve been trying to wash it out but I know it’s going to take a few more washes
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Like it so far.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son for Christmas. He says it wasn't too hot or cold. He hasn't washed it yet, but I'm thinking it will wash okay. The stitching is close together so the batting should bunch.
customer_reviews.author: T Seward

customer_reviews.title: Love love LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow is all I can say! This spread matches our country cabin theme perfectly, it’s oversized even for a king! It is identical to the photo and it’s warm enough but cool enough all at the same time! I would buy this over and over and over again! We also purchased the darker color in this for the guest room! The only complaint is that is could be softer, but still at that it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Herrick

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and I thought for the price I will try it. I love it, super happy with it. It’s in our guest room and really completes the room. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this bedding ensemble. It was perfect for our winter bedding for our camper. Not too heavy, yet very warm. Rich colors. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love it! The color and material are perfect. It is beautiful! It’s what I expected! I bought the king size
customer_reviews.author: Nathz

customer_reviews.title: Love love LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Wow is all I can say! This spread matches our country cabin theme perfectly, it’s oversized even for a king! It is identical to the photo and it’s warm enough but cool enough all at the same time! I would buy this over and over and over again! We also purchased the red color in this for the guest room! The only complaint is that is could be softer, but still at that it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Herrick

customer_reviews.title: Pleased!!
customer_reviews.text: VERY pleased. This was light-weight and exactly what I hoped for. I wanted to change up for the holiday season. Mission accomplished. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Christmas bedding!
customer_reviews.text: This bedding is beautiful! Perfect for my son’s winter/Christmas bedding! It’s soft and not bulky but very warm. I definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Casleton

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cozy
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this, I am using it for a Christmas look, but can use it for the rest of winter. I bought the matching sheets and it is a great look for the room and house
customer_reviews.author: TexasCrankiePerson

customer_reviews.title: Smelly Blanket
customer_reviews.text: The product itself gets 5 stars, very heavy, well made and as described. It lost a star for the smell, like many others, this product smells like a chemically cheap hotel room. Within 5 minutes of bringing it inside my whole house smelled like this blanket (before even unboxing!). Is this what china smells like?
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Not that impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a few months ago after seeing the quality of Woolrich quilt a friend has. I love the look of this quilt, very pretty but I dont think this one has the same quality. I'm a little disappointed. Its has some places coming loose and hasn't washed well like my friends. For the money I feel it shouldn't be wearing out already.
customer_reviews.author: Shana Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Oversized King Quilt
customer_reviews.text: This quilt was exactly what I was hoping for. I needed a comforter/quilt that when I woke up was still covering my husband and I. A normal sized king comforter was never good enough. This is also a nice quality quilt and makes a great alternative to a thicker comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Buckles

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I found this same blanket on Wayfair for so much more!!! This was a great price. The quality & weight are great. It’s a little stiff. Keeps you warm. Overall a good product for the price, compared to everywhere else I found this same setup.
customer_reviews.author: Rowena Old

customer_reviews.title: Very dark
customer_reviews.text: This set was a great value for what you get. My only major complaint is that it’s much darker in person than the pictures looked like. I wish it looked more like the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Solid Value on a Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with our Woolrich Quilt from Amazon. Extra large king. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina A. Trebil

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love this quilt. Before switching to a king bed, I had a similar Woolrich set on my queen bed. The two sets have some of the same fabrics and I was able to use the additional shams and throw pillows. Match perfectly. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: mfhal

customer_reviews.title: Grils drive trucks too...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Warm and i can wash it in my washing machine, have to rotate while drying it. Its a heavier qualit but good quality. I bought the match shower curtain and I love that too.
customer_reviews.author: PointBlank

customer_reviews.title: Very country.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this on my bed. Loved do much i bought two so I could put in our spare room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this quilt! It is plenty big enough to cover my King sized bed and its lightweight but warm!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Grabill

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I wanted!!!
customer_reviews.text: I find it hard sometimes to order bedding and pictures off the internet because of the colors that look one way on screen and another when you get them. This Quilt was spot on, just the colors I wanted - matched my bedroom walls and carpet perfect. I also found it to be very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Vielee Walter

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FIT
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the California king for my king size mattress. Fits perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Overnight guests adore this simple cabin quilt.
customer_reviews.text: Rich colors, good quality product, plenty of length to cover sides. Love the print. This quilt offers a cabin look I can use year round. For the price, I bought two king sizes sets for a vacation rental home. I love it and so do my guests.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!  You will have to pay return shipping for this item...
customer_reviews.text: After ordering the quilt, I found something else that worked better so it was no longer needed. The package arrived, I immediately requested a return. Long story short, even as an Amazon Prime member, I am required to pay postage on a large package to return to the sender. My suggestion is to purchase from a different vendor if you want this quilt.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M Martin

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was more durable.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this quilt, but I didn't even have it on my bed for 3 days and have rips and tears on it. I thought it would be better than that since its woolrich brand. As time goes on it just keeps getting more holes in it. I havent had it on my bed a month. Wish it was more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Complete Garbage! Came apart and made a mess in the washing machine the first time being washed!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful quilted comforter. Easy to put on the bed. I use mine for the Christmas season.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Our expectations were exceeded
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely beautiful set. Oversized (for a standard King mattress) - we don't have to worry about any cover stealing. Looks just like the images shown.
customer_reviews.author: Heffernan Family

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly what I was hoping for. It’s a standard quilt texture and feel. Works perfectly with our rustic theme. I got the king size and it’s quite large. We will be upgrading our bed to a king soon. Pictured is the king size quilt on a queen bed... just FYI
customer_reviews.author: Amy M Waugh

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS QUILT.
customer_reviews.text: ORDER THIS QUILT FOR MY FARMHOUSE BEDROOM. GOOD QUALITY WELL MADE LOOKS GREAT ON OUR KING SIZE BED WOULD ORDER AGAIN . VERY HAPPY !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cozy
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! I ordered a king size for our queen bed so that my husband and I wouldn’t have to fight for enough coverage. This is really oversized and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SOOOO nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought the used one but it looked brand new to me. This is the kind of comfort you used to get with homemade quilts!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: colors totally different than picture
customer_reviews.text: The colors were totally different then the picture (black and brown compared to light grey and tan as picture indicates). I wish i would of read the reviews before i ordered it but, i can't believe they still continue to sell this item with the wrong picture. On a positive note i like the product and would re-purchase it if the colors were true to the picture shown online.
customer_reviews.author: Dissatisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: I like this product and it is warm
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and it is warm. Heavier than expected and that is great. But I washed it when I got it and I already have threads coming undone. If it wasn't for the thread coming undone a bit, I would have easily rated 5 stars. 4 stars if the manufacture does something about this.
customer_reviews.author: TR

product_meta.title: Woolrich Check Oversized Quilt Mini Set Gray Full/Queen
product_meta.description: Size:Full/Queen| Color:GrayThis Wool rich quilt set features a classic buffalo check pattern and reverses to a solid color. Made from 100% cotton this lightweight quilt is soft to the touch and can be used year round. The set includes 1 quilt and 2 shams.
feature_bullets: This Wool rich quilt set features a classic buffalo check pattern and reverses to a solid color. Made from 100% cotton this lightweight quilt is soft to the touch and can be used year round. The set includes 1 quilt and 2 shams.
Set Include:1 Quilt:92"W x 96"L 2 Standard Shams:20"W x 26"L +0.5"D (2)
Material Details:100% cotton percale printed face and solid reverse, 90% cotton 10% other fill, pre-washed

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars743 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
